dt-example.title: Buttons integration
dt-example.info: The Buttons extension for DataTables can be initialised very easily though the `-init layout` option and `-feature buttons` feature. SearchBuilder is also initialised as a feature and the two can co-exist on the same DataTable with no issues, as shown in this example.
